com.google.enterprise.connector.spi
Class SecureDocument

java.lang.Object
  com.google.enterprise.connector.spi.SecureDocument
All Implemented Interfaces:
Document
public class SecureDocument
extends java.lang.Object
implements Document

An implementation of the Document interface for use with ACLs. Instances are created using the static factory methods. There are no public constructors. Implementors may use this directly or for reference.

Since:
3.0

Method Detail

createAcl

public static SecureDocument createAcl(java.lang.String docId,
                                       java.lang.String searchUrl)
Constructs a SecureDocument representing a stand-alone ACL. Implies a document type of ACL.

Parameters:
docId - the unique document ID
searchUrl - the repository URL, may be null
See Also:
SpiConstants.PROPNAME_DOCID, SpiConstants.PROPNAME_SEARCHURL

createAcl

public static SecureDocument createAcl(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<Value>> properties)
Constructs a SecureDocument representing a stand-alone ACL whose metadata consists of the supplied Map of properties, associating property names with their Values. Implies a document type of ACL.

Parameters:
properties - a Map of document metadata

createDocumentWithAcl

public static SecureDocument createDocumentWithAcl(Document document)
                                            throws RepositoryException
Constructs a SecureDocument representing a document with an ACL whose metadata consists of the properties of the given Document. The document may represent a stand-alone ACL or an indexable document.

Parameters:
document - a base document whose properties are included in the return SecureDocument
Throws:
RepositoryException - if an error occurs accessing the underlying document

createDocumentWithAcl

public static SecureDocument createDocumentWithAcl(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<Value>> properties)
Constructs a SecureDocument representing a document with an ACL whose metadata consists of the supplied Map of properties, associating property names with their Values. Implies a document type of RECORD.

Parameters:
properties - a Map of document metadata

findProperty

public Property findProperty(java.lang.String name)
                      throws RepositoryException
Finds a Property by name. If the current document has a property then that property is returned.

Specified by:
findProperty in interface Document
Parameters:
name - the name of the Property to find
Returns:
the Property, if found; null otherwise
Throws:
RepositoryException - if an error occurs accessing the underlying document

getPropertyNames

public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getPropertyNames()
                                                 throws RepositoryException
Gets the set of names of all Properties in this Document.

Specified by:
getPropertyNames in interface Document
Returns:
the names, as a Set of Strings
Throws:
RepositoryException - if an error occurs accessing the underlying document

setInheritFrom

public void setInheritFrom(java.lang.String url)
Sets the URL for an inherited ACL.

Only one of setInheritFrom(String url) or #setInheritFrom(String docid, FeedType feedType) should be called. If both are called the inherit-from docid and feedType will be ignored in favor of the inherit-from url.

Parameters:
url - the URL of the parent ACL
See Also:
SpiConstants.PROPNAME_ACLINHERITFROM

setInheritFrom

public void setInheritFrom(java.lang.String docid,
                           SpiConstants.FeedType feedType)
Sets the components needed to construct the inherit-from URL of an ACL that was fed using FeedType.CONTENT, FeedType.CONTENTURL, or FeedType.ACL.

Only one of setInheritFrom(String url) or #setInheritFrom(String docid, FeedType feedType) should be called. If both are called the inherit-from docid and feedType will be ignored in favor of the inherit-from url.

Parameters:
docid - the docid of the parent ACL document
feedType - the FeedType of the parent ACL document, or null if this document's FeedType should be used.
See Also:
SpiConstants.PROPNAME_ACLINHERITFROM

setInheritanceType

public void setInheritanceType(SpiConstants.AclInheritanceType type)
Sets the inheritance type.

Parameters:
type - one of the SpiConstants.AclInheritanceType values
See Also:
SpiConstants.PROPNAME_ACLINHERITANCETYPE

addPrincipal

public void addPrincipal(java.lang.String name,
                         SpiConstants.AclScope scope,
                         SpiConstants.AclAccess access)
                  throws RepositoryException
Adds a user or group to the ACL. The scope determines whether the principal is a user or group, and the access determines whether the principal is permitted or denied access.

Parameters:
name - the user or group name
scope - whether the principal is a user or group name, one of the SpiConstants.AclScope values
access - whether access is permitted or denied, one of the SpiConstants.AclAccess values
Throws:
RepositoryException - if an error occurs accessing the underlying document
See Also:
SpiConstants.PROPNAME_ACLGROUPS, SpiConstants.PROPNAME_ACLUSERS, SpiConstants.PROPNAME_ACLDENYGROUPS, SpiConstants.PROPNAME_ACLDENYUSERS
